tasks.label: C/C++: g++ générer le fichier actif
tasks.command: g++ -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I..  -I./../melinda/  -DNDEBUG     -O3 -MT paraminer_local_graduals.o -MD -MP -MF .deps/paraminer_local_graduals.Tpo -c -o paraminer_local_graduals.o paraminer_local_graduals.cpp;mv -f .deps/paraminer_local_graduals.Tpo .deps/paraminer_local_graduals.Po;g++  -O3  -o ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension} paraminer_local_graduals.o paraminer.o element.o database.o pattern.o utils.o ../melinda/libmelinda.a -lpthread -lpthread
